definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Werder Bremen, for sure, will be my first point of contact.
sentences.chinese: 雲達不來梅顯然是我合同的首要選擇。

sentences.english: Sind Sie hier in Bremen angemeldet?
The Bremen Senate issued its own notes tied to gold.
sentences.chinese: 不來梅參議院發行了與黃金捆綁的票據。

sentences.english: Juventus coach Didier Dechamps has confirmed his interest in Werder Bremen midfielder Thorsten Frings.
sentences.chinese: 尤文教練德尚承認他對不來梅中場球員弗林斯感興趣。

sentences.english: Werder had to thank their goalkeeper for keeping them in the game.
sentences.chinese: 不來梅應該謝謝他們的守門員在比賽中的穩定。

sentences.english: I am delighted to be able to play again after a six month lay-off .
sentences.chinese: 我很高興在受傷休息的六個月後再次爲不來梅隊效力。

sentences.english: Heute spiel t werder bremen gegen chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 今天雲達不來梅對戰切爾西。

sentences.english: She lived in Worpswede, in the fens north-east of Bremen in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 她住在沃爾普斯韋德，在德國不來梅的東北方。
